basics.name: Stanislav Sobolev
basics.label: Full stack developer, Marketing specialist
basics.summary:
Software Developer with 6 years history of productivity and successful project outcomes.
                Startup founder with expirience of bootstraping and scaling SaaS product without external investments to profitable company.
                Highly organized and independent; able to effectively coordinate tasks to accomplish projects with timeliness and creativity.
                Innovative, enthusiastic, and uncompromising work ethic.
